evidence.claim: RSi Enrollment Services complies with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive patient information.
RSi Enrollment Services integrates with EHR systems to facilitate EDI transaction sets.
RSi's services include support for FHIR standards for exchanging healthcare information.
The company utilizes cloud services for scalability and data security.

icp.icp_reason: Company operates with X12 healthcare transactions and values API integrations.
